text.text:
Ecotel Hotel, located near Charbagh Bus Stand in Lucknow, offers a convenient stay for travelers due to its proximity to the railway station and metro. Guests frequently commend the hotel for its cleanliness, attentive staff, and quality of food. The rooms are described as spacious, well-maintained, and tastefully decorated, providing a comfortable experience. The hotel's staff is noted for being courteous and accommodating, often going above and beyond to assist guests.

However, some guests have mentioned that the hotel's close location to transportation hubs can result in noise disturbances in front-facing rooms. Additionally, the surrounding area has been described as congested and, at times, unclean. Despite these concerns, many travelers find the overall experience at Ecotel Hotel to be positive, highlighting its affordability, cleanliness, and the quality of service provided.
Overall, Ecotel Hotel stands out as a commendable choice for those seeking a comfortable stay with excellent service in Lucknow, especially for those prioritizing proximity to major transportation centers.

text.text:
This was my first time staying at this hotel, chosen purely based on reviews and images. The booking process through MMT was seamless—kudos to them!

With a novice jitter, I navigated my way from Charbagh Metro Station (Lucknow JN Railway Station—less than 1 km away) to the hotel. The approach road appeared shabby at first, but it carried an old-city charm.

The check-in experience was welcoming, though the receptionist’s behavior was slightly below expectations. However, stepping into the room completely changed my perspective—the infrastructure was truly impressive.

In the end, my stay was comfortable, relaxing, and refreshing—a great experience overall! Definitely recommend!

We had a wonderful stay at Fortune Park BBD, Lucknow.

A big thank you to GM Vaibhav for personally reaching out, following up, and welcoming us so warmly. We were provided 2 comfortable rooms, and the entire team went out of their way to make our stay exceptional. Special thanks to Harshita from accommodation, Aman from housekeeping, Chef Amanul, and the restaurant staff Sundaram and Alam for their outstanding hospitality and constant care.

Their genuine efforts and attention to detail truly made our experience memorable. Highly recommend!

text.text:
I m staying n invited a guest for dinner at Hotel, praising their buffet based on my past experiences. While the staff was courteous and attentive, we were quite disappointed with the non-vegetarian food options and quality. The variety was limited, and the taste didn’t match the expectations set by the hotel’s otherwise great reputation.

That said, I appreciate the hospitality and how receptive the staff was to our feedback. I hope the management takes this as an opportunity to enhance the dining experience, especially for non-vegetarian guests. Looking forward to improvements in the future!

text.text:
Orchid restaurant @Fortune Hotel Jopling Road is a fine dine restaurant for in house hotel guests as well as open to outside diners as well.
We went in group for weekend lunch to this restaurant which serves both Indian as well as Continental stuff.
This time we all wanted to have Continental stuff and particularly the grill platters.We ordered Grilled chicken,Grilled Paneer and Grilled Fish platters.
The food was good and the chicken platter stood out with mashed potatoes and dip.
The Grilled paneer was slightly bland and required some extra salt and black pepper as per our taste, though cooked well.
The meal was washed with peach ice tea.
A hearty meal!

text.text:
Here are The Piccadily Hotel, Lucknow showcasing its elegant exterior, pool area, and interior ambiance.

---

The Piccadily Hotel, Lucknow: Overview & Key Features

Location & Ambience

Located in Sector B, LDA Colony, Kanpur Road, just 5–10 minutes from the Lucknow airport and around 7 km from Hazratganj, the hotel offers easy access to both travel hubs and city shopping areas.

The entrance features a grand driveway leading into a plush lobby with royal décor and comfortable leather seating, creating a luxurious, welcoming vibe.

Rooms

The hotel offers a range of neat and spacious rooms:

Superior Twin/King, Executive Twin/King, Luxury Rooms, Suites, Luxury Suites, and a Presidential Suite (sizes ranging from ~30 sq m to 92 sq m), all with complimentary Wi-Fi.

Rooms are equipped with amenities like satellite TV, minibar, tea/coffee maker, electronic safe, direct-dial phone, and well-appointed bathrooms including hair dryers, in both standard and suite categories.

Front Office & Guest Services

The front office is known for its friendliness and efficiency—guests regularly praise staff members like Monika, Mudrika, Mahima, Mr. Pandey, and others for their warm hospitality and helpfulness during check-in and throughout the stay.

Additional services include airport/rail transfers, housekeeping, laundry, currency exchange, travel desk, doctor on call, salon, gym, spa, and more—all adding to a seamless stay experience.

Front Elevation & Aesthetic

The hotel's exterior is imposing and polished, backed by well-maintained grounds. The images show a stately façade in red brick tones, and a well-designed pool area that enhances its upscale character.

Security & Guardian

While explicit security staff details aren't highlighted in listings, the hotel’s reputation as a premium business-class property with 24-hour reception and organized services implies professional security protocols and a safe environment throughout.

Rooftop Garden / Venue Space

The hotel features a Terrace: an attractive outdoor venue suited for weddings and social events, accommodating up to **350 seated

text.text:
5/5 – Royal Comfort at Saraca Lucknow! ⭐

Saraca Lucknow is truly one of the finest luxury hotels in the city. From the moment you step in, you're welcomed with elegance, sophistication, and heartfelt hospitality.

🏨 Rooms: Spacious, clean, and beautifully designed with a royal Awadhi touch. The comfort level is top-notch, making you feel like royalty!

🤝 Service: The staff is incredibly polite and professional. Every request is handled with care and efficiency. You’ll always be greeted with a smile.

📍 Location: Situated in a prime area of Lucknow, the hotel is close to major attractions yet offers peace and calm within its premises.

🍽️ Food: The dining experience is exceptional! From local Lucknowi cuisine to international dishes, every bite is flavorful and authentic.

Overall, Saraca Lucknow offers the perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and culture. Highly recommended for anyone visiting the city – whether for business or leisure. A truly royal experience! 🌟

text.text:
My stay at this hotel was an absolute nightmare. From the moment we arrived, it was clear that cleanliness and guest comfort were not priorities. The room had not been cleaned after the previous guests, with unmade beds and unchanged sheets. When we requested fresh linens, we were told the laundry staff wasn’t available, so nothing could be done immediately. The washrooms were in a filthy state, yet despite raising concerns, no effort was made to address the issue.

To make matters worse, the room boy, Vikas, was incredibly rude and behaved as if he had more authority than the manager. Instead of addressing our concerns, he had the audacity to say, 'Ma’am, you may check out if you're not satisfied.' Things escalated when he snatched the keys from us and even went as far as threatening to lock us in the room if we didn’t leave. In an unfamiliar location, this was not just unprofessional but outright dangerous. How can guests feel safe in a place where employees behave this way?

The level of unprofessionalism, lack of hospitality, and outright hostility were beyond anything I’ve ever experienced. I would strongly advise against staying here unless serious changes are made to both the staff and management.

text.text:
Hotel Vills offers budget-friendly accommodations in Lucknow, making it a solid choice for travelers looking for spacious rooms at an affordable price. The rooms are well-maintained and provide ample space, ensuring a comfortable stay. The location is convenient, though it comes with its challenges.

One drawback is the lack of dedicated parking. Guests have to park their vehicles on the road, which is narrow and allows only one car to pass at a time. This can be inconvenient, especially if another vehicle approaches from the opposite direction, as it requires reversing to make way.

The property has been converted from a house into a guest house, but the transformation has been handled well. It retains a cozy, homely vibe while offering the services expected in a hotel. The staff is courteous and attentive, which adds to the positive experience.

Overall, Hotel Vills is a great option for budget-conscious travelers who prioritize spacious rooms and good service over parking convenience.

2) Location of the Hotel
3) Availability of Parking

Cons

3) Food - The restaurant of the hotel was way too expensive for the quantity of the food they were offering. And many things that were mentioned in the menu were not available during lunch time.

text.text:
I stayed at Hotel Legend during my one-week visit to Lucknow, and unfortunately, my experience was very disappointing.

I had booked a room for two guests (non-refundable booking), as I wanted to stay with my friend who is a local resident of Lucknow. However, the hotel denied his entry, stating their "local ID policy." Despite repeated discussions with the front desk and several attempts to explain, they refused to listen or make any exceptions.

As a result, I was forced to stay alone in a room booked for two, which felt unfair since I had paid for double occupancy. The management showed no flexibility or customer concern.

For the remaining days, I moved to another nearby hotel, which was much better in every aspect—cleaner, friendlier, and most importantly, they allowed genuine guest access to rooms without unnecessary restrictions.

⚠️ My advice: Please stay away from Hotel Legend if you plan to stay with a friend or expect a comfortable, guest-friendly experience. There are far better options around Lucknow.

text.text:
I checked in today for a two-night stay in their suite with a bathtub. My flight landed at 7 AM, and I had already spoken to the hotel beforehand requesting an early check-in. Unfortunately, despite the room being vacant, we were made to wait two hours before being given the keys. I understand hotel policies may not allow early check-in more than four hours before standard time, but what was disappointing was that even during those two hours in the lobby, it took them an hour just to serve us a glass of water.

The suite itself is spacious, with two bathrooms, a sitting area, and a bedroom. However, I learned that the property is 15 years old, and it shows. The room has wooden paneling on all walls, but the storage space is limited—just one cupboard, which is inadequate for even two people. The mattress was slightly smaller than the bed, affecting the aesthetics. The room had a musty smell, like it hadn’t been aired out in a while. The bathroom is large with a bathtub, but the fittings, mirror, and toilet look old and in need of replacement. There was no hot water during my first day. The French windows in both the bedroom and sitting area have visible water stains, which affect the view. Outside the room, the passageway has water dripping from the roof, possibly from AC vents.

I requested a room freshener to deal with the musty smell, but it never arrived. The reception staff were polite but not particularly warm—everything was handled in a matter-of-fact way without much hospitality.

On the positive side, the location is excellent—right in the Hazratganj area, close to all major tourist spots in Lucknow. I’ve only stayed one night so far, so let’s see how tomorrow goes.

Great location and well-designed rooms — the bathrooms were clean and had all the essentials. That’s where the good part ends.

The staff was rude and completely unwelcoming, which really ruined the experience.From the moment we checked in, there was this coldness — no warmth, no sense of hospitality. It genuinely felt like they were doing us a favour by letting us stay there. On top of that, there were frequent power cuts, and no one seemed bothered or apologetic about it.

For the price and reputation, I expected basic courtesy and smoother service. Disappointed.
It’s frustrating because the property has potential. But if you're looking for a pleasant, smooth, and welcoming experience — I’d suggest looking elsewhere unless they seriously work on their service and basic infrastructure.

text.text:
I am writing to express my disappointment with my recent experience at Regenta Central Lucknow, which marks the second time I have felt let down by your services.
During this stay, I faced significant inconvenience due to non-functional air conditioning. Despite changing rooms three times, I was not provided a room with a properly working AC:

Room 4115 – AC was completely non-functional.

Room 4114 – AC not cooling, no fridge, broken mirror, faulty flush, and several non-working lights.

Room 4112 – AC worked for about 2 hours and then stopped cooling altogether.

While the staff was courteous and tried to be supportive, they were unable to resolve the issue. I now understand why each room has a ceiling fan — seemingly to compensate for malfunctioning AC units, which is not expected at this price point or standard of service.

This follows an earlier disappointing experience:
Last year, I had to cancel my booking due to a sudden family emergency. I had informed the management in good faith and was verbally assured a credit for a future stay, with no terms discussed at the time. However, when I reached out 10 months later to utilize that credit, I was told that the credit validity was only 3 months — a condition that was never communicated earlier. Despite multiple requests, not even a complimentary meal was offered as a goodwill gesture.

Both experiences reflect poorly on guest service and post-booking support. I hope you will take this feedback seriously and work toward improving both the maintenance of your property and transparency in guest communication.

text.text:
I recently stayed at Regenta Central, Lucknow, and while I truly appreciated the hospitality and responsiveness of the staff, I feel compelled to point out some issues that need urgent attention.

We had booked the **Royal Suite**, but unfortunately, the **AC wasn’t working**. I requested the staff to look into it, and they tried their best, but eventually had to **shift us to another room**. The new room was quite nice, with good interiors and overall ambiance — but the **AC again was not up to the mark**.

Additionally, **hot water wasn’t available in the tap**, and even after waiting for a long time, it didn’t work properly. While we visited in the summer, I can only imagine how inconvenient this would be in winter.

Again, I want to **emphasize that the staff was very courteous and helpful** — they are doing a commendable job with the resources available to them. The issues seem to be related to **infrastructure and maintenance**, which I hope the hotel management or higher authorities will address soon.

This place has great potential, but it urgently needs **renovation and better facilities** to truly offer a comfortable experience.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Crowne Plaza. From the moment I arrived, the service was impeccable, and the staff went out of their way to make me feel welcome and comfortable.

The check-in process was smooth, with the front desk team greeting me with genuine warmth and offering helpful recommendations for local attractions. Throughout my stay, every staff member—whether housekeeping, concierge, or room service—was attentive, friendly, and professional.

The room itself was spotless and beautifully designed, with a perfect balance of luxury and comfort. The bed was incredibly cozy, and the amenities were top-notch. It felt like a true escape after a long day.

A huge thank you to everyone at Crowne Plaza for making my stay so enjoyable and stress-free. I’ll definitely be coming back and will recommend this hotel to friends and family for their next stay.

text.text: Guests consistently praise the hotel's spacious, elegantly designed rooms with panoramic views, modern amenities, and comfortable furnishings that blend luxury with practicality. The professional staff are celebrated for their warm, helpful attitude and proactive service, from smooth check-in to always-ready assistance, ensuring every need is met efficiently. Dining is a highlight, with diverse menus featuring local flavors, and the breakfast and restaurant experiences are frequently described as delightful. Recreational offerings include a pristine rooftop pool with superb city views, a well-equipped gym, and flexible meeting spaces ideal for events and business travelers. While some minor teething issues were noted during opening, the overall level of service, cleanliness, and atmosphere consistently exceeds expectations, making Crowne Plaza Lucknow a top choice for leisure and business stays alike.

text.text: I booked 18 rooms for 38 adults on our stay at All Seasons in Lucknow during the peak of summers on 27 June 2025. I must say that the rooms were in excellent condition, neat and tidy. Washrooms were absolutely perfect, no leaking taps or smell. The air conditioning in the rooms and the buffet area was perfect. We had breakfast and lunch and I must appreciate that all veg and non veg dishes were perfectly made and were real tasty. Staff promptness in attending guests requirements was impeccable. Hats off to Mr. Varun of All Seasons, who delivered more than 100% of what he had committed me over phone calls when I was making the booking. All my relatives who were travelling with me were very happy with the services provided and I didn’t receive a single complaint from anyone, hence I couldn’t stop myself from writing this sweet review about Hotel All Season. Thanks Varun ji for delivering what you promised on phone and all the best to your entire team who I must say was very well trained and polite. A special thanks to the chef who made sumptuous omlettes for us and made sure that these were served hot in our plates.

text.text:
Centrum, Lucknow is not just a hotel—it’s an experience.

As part of my professional duties, I travel extensively—almost half the month. While India is home to many remarkable properties in the hospitality space, Centrum stands apart. The thought, design, construction, and overall experience are truly novel.

From what I could gather, the architecture beautifully blends stone, wood, and metal, creating an ambiance that is earthy, humble, and yet grand. The staff is exceptionally friendly, the food is thoughtfully curated, and every detail reflects a deep sense of care.

A wonderful property—superbly designed. I would love to return.

text.text:
As always have been told, all is good that end good, so starting with the good things.
Rooms was nice, spacious, proper amenities inside room with a locker too. The location is great from railway station, airport and all the older food joints of Lucknow. Quite ambience inside the hotel too. Good things ends here.
Bathroom has been leaking, so no point of wet and dry area. The water mixer was broken, had to use it in the last adjusted setting which was super hot for August. The commode too was leaking. Had to wait for 1 hour 30 minutes before a room was allotted. We were told initially to wait for 30 minutes, waited patiently, then 15 minutes, towards the it got me, went to the counter and asked them how much more, said 10 minutes and the saga continues. They have been constantly saying that "Sorry we are fully booked that's why the delay". We are not staying free, people pay, so if booked fully manage your workforce, instead of placing 1 intern and 1 front desk guy. Yes, I accept we reached early at 12.45 PM, and the check-in time was officially 2 PM, but we also have informed that at the time of booking itself. Should have responded then and there. We could have booked something else. Worst service I have ever seen in the same category of hotels. And moreover if you need time, spill it out at once not like 30 minutes, 15 minutes and continuing. Paying at a hotel and then waiting for 1 hour 30 minutes for the room is nonsense.

Ecotel Hotel, located near Charbagh Bus Stand in Lucknow, offers a convenient stay for travelers due to its proximity to the railway station and metro. Guests frequently commend the hotel for its cleanliness, attentive staff, and quality of food. The rooms are described as spacious, well-maintained, and tastefully decorated, providing a comfortable experience. The hotel's staff is noted for being courteous and accommodating, often going above and beyond to assist guests.

However, some guests have mentioned that the hotel's close location to transportation hubs can result in noise disturbances in front-facing rooms. Additionally, the surrounding area has been described as congested and, at times, unclean. Despite these concerns, many travelers find the overall experience at Ecotel Hotel to be positive, highlighting its affordability, cleanliness, and the quality of service provided.
Overall, Ecotel Hotel stands out as a commendable choice for those seeking a comfortable stay with excellent service in Lucknow, especially for those prioritizing proximity to major transportation centers.

text.text:
The Piccadily Lucknow: A Modern Oasis in the Heart of Lucknow

The Piccadily Lucknow presents itself as a contemporary haven in the bustling city. Its modern amenities blend seamlessly with Lucknow's rich cultural heritage, offering guests a comfortable and stylish stay.

Key Highlights:
Modern Comfort: The hotel boasts well-appointed rooms with contemporary decor, ensuring a relaxing ambiance.

Culinary Delights: The on-site restaurant promises a diverse range of flavors, catering to different palates.

Convenient Location: Its strategic position makes it easily accessible to both business and leisure travelers.

Attentive Service: Guests often praise the staff for their warm hospitality and efficient service.

Relaxation Options: The spa and outdoor pool provide opportunities to unwind and rejuvenate.
Areas to Consider:
While the overall experience is positive, some guests have mentioned minor issues such as breakfast quality and occasional service lapses. However, these seem to be isolated cases and don't overshadow the hotel's strengths.
Overall, The Piccadily Lucknow appears to be a solid choice for those seeking a comfortable and modern accommodation in Lucknow.

text.text:
Here are The Piccadily Hotel, Lucknow showcasing its elegant exterior, pool area, and interior ambiance.

---

The Piccadily Hotel, Lucknow: Overview & Key Features

Location & Ambience

Located in Sector B, LDA Colony, Kanpur Road, just 5–10 minutes from the Lucknow airport and around 7 km from Hazratganj, the hotel offers easy access to both travel hubs and city shopping areas.

The entrance features a grand driveway leading into a plush lobby with royal décor and comfortable leather seating, creating a luxurious, welcoming vibe.

Rooms

The hotel offers a range of neat and spacious rooms:

Superior Twin/King, Executive Twin/King, Luxury Rooms, Suites, Luxury Suites, and a Presidential Suite (sizes ranging from ~30 sq m to 92 sq m), all with complimentary Wi-Fi.

Rooms are equipped with amenities like satellite TV, minibar, tea/coffee maker, electronic safe, direct-dial phone, and well-appointed bathrooms including hair dryers, in both standard and suite categories.

Front Office & Guest Services

The front office is known for its friendliness and efficiency—guests regularly praise staff members like Monika, Mudrika, Mahima, Mr. Pandey, and others for their warm hospitality and helpfulness during check-in and throughout the stay.

Additional services include airport/rail transfers, housekeeping, laundry, currency exchange, travel desk, doctor on call, salon, gym, spa, and more—all adding to a seamless stay experience.

Front Elevation & Aesthetic

The hotel's exterior is imposing and polished, backed by well-maintained grounds. The images show a stately façade in red brick tones, and a well-designed pool area that enhances its upscale character.

Security & Guardian

While explicit security staff details aren't highlighted in listings, the hotel’s reputation as a premium business-class property with 24-hour reception and organized services implies professional security protocols and a safe environment throughout.

Rooftop Garden / Venue Space

The hotel features a Terrace: an attractive outdoor venue suited for weddings and social events, accommodating up to **350 seated

text.text:
Hotel Vills offers budget-friendly accommodations in Lucknow, making it a solid choice for travelers looking for spacious rooms at an affordable price. The rooms are well-maintained and provide ample space, ensuring a comfortable stay. The location is convenient, though it comes with its challenges.

One drawback is the lack of dedicated parking. Guests have to park their vehicles on the road, which is narrow and allows only one car to pass at a time. This can be inconvenient, especially if another vehicle approaches from the opposite direction, as it requires reversing to make way.

The property has been converted from a house into a guest house, but the transformation has been handled well. It retains a cozy, homely vibe while offering the services expected in a hotel. The staff is courteous and attentive, which adds to the positive experience.

Overall, Hotel Vills is a great option for budget-conscious travelers who prioritize spacious rooms and good service over parking convenience.

text.text: I had the pleasure of staying at Regenta Central Lucknow last weekend, and it was truly a memorable experience. Whether you’re in town for business, leisure, or just passing through, this hotel has everything to offer for a comfortable and satisfying stay. The rooms were spacious, modern, and impeccably clean. The décor had a pleasant mix of traditional Lucknawi touches with contemporary comfort. My room had a fantastic view of the city, and the plush bedding ensured I had a restful night. The amenities provided were top-notch, including fast Wi-Fi, a well-stocked minibar, and a spacious bathroom with luxurious toiletries. The service at Regenta Central was exceptional. From the moment I arrived, the staff was warm, welcoming, and always attentive to my needs. Whether it was at the front desk or room service, I was consistently impressed by their professionalism and willingness to go the extra mile to ensure a pleasant stay.

text.text:
Great location and well-designed rooms — the bathrooms were clean and had all the essentials. That’s where the good part ends.

The staff was rude and completely unwelcoming, which really ruined the experience.From the moment we checked in, there was this coldness — no warmth, no sense of hospitality. It genuinely felt like they were doing us a favour by letting us stay there. On top of that, there were frequent power cuts, and no one seemed bothered or apologetic about it.

For the price and reputation, I expected basic courtesy and smoother service. Disappointed.
It’s frustrating because the property has potential. But if you're looking for a pleasant, smooth, and welcoming experience — I’d suggest looking elsewhere unless they seriously work on their service and basic infrastructure.

Location: Most properties are located in prime areas, with good connectivity to airports or business districts.

Overall, my stay at Hotel Clarks Avadh was outstanding. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the city and look forward to returning in the future

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Hotel D Silver Leaf, Lucknow and it exceeded all my expectations. The location was good and only 1.4 kms away from Lucknow Charbagh Station.
From the moment I arrived, I was impressed by the impeccable service and luxurious atmosphere. The room was spacious, beautifully decorated and incredibly comfortable.
The staff was attentive, always ready to assist with a smile.
The dining experience was exceptional with a variety of delicious dishes to choose from. The hotel's amenities added to the overall relaxation. It's a top notch establishment that made my stay truly memorable.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Skyhotel, and I can confidently say that it was an exceptional experience from start to finish. This hotel truly exceeded my expectations in every aspect, leaving me with memories of a delightful and memorable stay.

From the moment I stepped into the hotel, I was greeted with warm smiles and a welcoming atmosphere. The staff at Skyotel were incredibly friendly, attentive, and went above and beyond to ensure that my needs were met. Their professionalism and genuine care for their guests were truly remarkable.

The rooms at Skyotel were spacious, beautifully decorated, and maintained to the highest standards of cleanliness. The attention to detail was evident, from the comfortable beds and plush linens to the well-appointed amenities. I appreciated the thoughtfulness that went into every aspect of the room, ensuring a comfortable and relaxing environment throughout my stay.

The dining experience at Skyotel was nothing short of excellent. The on-site restaurant offered a diverse menu featuring a wide array of delicious dishes. The quality of the food was outstanding, and the presentation was equally impressive. Whether I was enjoying a hearty breakfast or indulging in a delectable dinner, the ricepoha offerings never failed to impress me.

Furthermore, the hotel's facilities were top-notch. The fitness center was well-equipped with modern machines, allowing me to maintain my workout routine during my stay.

One aspect that truly set Skyotel apart was its convenient location. Situated in the heart of Lucknow, it provided easy access to popular attractions, shopping centers, and transportation hubs. This made exploring the city a breeze, allowing me to make the most of my time during my stay.

Overall, my experience at Skyotel was nothing short of exceptional. From the friendly and attentive staff to the impeccable rooms and outstanding dining options, every aspect of my stay was truly remarkable. I highly recommend Skyotel to anyone seeking a luxurious and memorable stay in Lucknow. I look forward to returning to this remarkable hotel in the future.

text.text:
Title: A Luxurious Haven for Extravagant Parties and events.

I recently had the pleasure of experiencing the epitome of luxury and elegance at the premier hotel and convention center in Lucknow. From the moment I stepped into the grand lobby, I was greeted with a warm welcome and a level of hospitality that surpassed all my expectations. This exceptional establishment offers a harmonious blend of first-class amenities, breathtaking event spaces, and opulent accommodations, making it an ideal choice for both leisure and business travelers.

Let me start by highlighting the captivating party and community halls this hotel has to offer. If you're seeking a venue that guarantees an unforgettable celebration, look no further. Their party hall is a haven for anyone looking to throw a grand bash. The tasteful decor, state-of-the-art lighting, and cutting-edge sound system create an atmosphere that is nothing short of magical. Whether it's a wedding reception, anniversary party, or corporate event, this venue is sure to impress even the most discerning guests.

Additionally, the hotel's community hall is perfect for hosting social gatherings, meetings, or conferences. With its flexible seating arrangements and advanced audiovisual equipment, it provides a conducive environment for productive discussions and meaningful interactions. The dedicated staff members are always at hand to assist with event planning and ensure every detail is executed flawlessly.

Now, let's talk about the accommodations – the true definition of luxury. The hotel boasts spacious and meticulously designed rooms that epitomize comfort and sophistication. The 5-star category rooms are tastefully decorated, featuring plush furnishings, premium amenities, and an ambiance that exudes tranquility. Every aspect of the room, from the soft bed linens to the elegant bathroom fixtures, is crafted to provide an indulgent experience for guests.

One of the standout features of this hotel is its lavish pool area. Surrounded by lush greenery and offering a serene escape from the bustling city, the pool is a haven for relaxation. Whether you want to take a refreshing dip, soak up the sun on a comfortable lounger, or enjoy a poolside cocktail, this oasis provides the perfect setting to unwind and rejuvenate.

The hotel's commitment to impeccable service is evident in every interaction. The staff members are friendly, attentive, and go above and beyond to ensure guest satisfaction. From the concierge desk to the dining establishments, every department operates seamlessly to create an unforgettable experience for guests.

In conclusion, the premier hotel and convention center in Lucknow sets the benchmark for luxurious accommodations, extravagant event spaces, and unparalleled service. Whether you're planning a magnificent celebration or seeking a lavish retreat, this establishment will exceed your every expectation. From the elegantly designed rooms to the remarkable party and community halls, this hotel is a true gem that elevates any occasion to extraordinary heights.

text.text:
Hotel Centrum in Lucknow is a fantastic place to stay. The hotel offers exceptional service and a comfortable atmosphere that makes you feel right at home. The rooms are spacious, well-maintained, and equipped with modern amenities. The staff is friendly, courteous, and always ready to assist with any request.

The hotel's location is not far off from the airport. However, there are no roadside shops or markets nearby so that you can buy small items. You will have to hire a taxi. The on-site dining options provide a wide range of delicious dishes, satisfying even the most discerning palates.

One of the standout features of Hotel Centrum is its attention to detail. From the elegant decor to the impeccable cleanliness, every aspect of the hotel reflects a commitment to excellence. The amenities, such as the gym and swimming pool, are well-maintained and provide a perfect place to relax and rejuvenate.

Overall, I highly recommend Hotel Centrum for anyone visiting Lucknow. Whether you're traveling for business or leisure, this hotel offers a wonderful experience that will exceed your expectations. However, as expected, the hotel is pretty costly.

The best thing about this hotel is that its very centrally located, just a few hundred mtrs from the station and around a km from the main market Hazratganj.

The rooms are spacious, elegantly decorated, and immaculately clean. The cozy bed and luxurious amenities will make it feel like a home away from home. The hotel staff is always attentive to our needs, ensuring our stay was comfortable and enjoyable.

I must mention that the ambiance of the restaurant was equally enchanting. The soothing music and dim lighting created a cozy atmosphere, perfect for a romantic dinner or a relaxed evening with friends. The presentation of each dish was a work of art, and the flavors were simply divine. The service was impeccable, with the staff offering helpful recommendations.
Recommend this hotel to all!!

text.text: I recently stayed at the Ginger Hotel in Lucknow for my two days teachers training (Re skilling / Up skilling Workshop) and was thoroughly impressed. From the moment I arrived, the staff were welcoming and attentive, ensuring a swift and pleasant check-in. The room was exceptionally clean, spacious, and well-appointed with a comfortable bed and modern amenities. I particularly enjoyed the variety of dining options available - the breakfast buffet was a highlight, offering a wide range of delicious choices. The hotel’s location is convenient, making it easy to explore the city. Overall, my stay was delightful and I would highly recommend the Ginger Hotel in Lucknow to anyone seeking comfort and quality service.

text.text:
Cleanliness and design of the room, prompt & polite services, location of hotel, quality of food and above all value for money are the key reasons for my awarding 5 points to Hotel Ginger,Lucknow. The room was not very big but was designed elegantly and was very functional. All my needs were met adequately. The quality of soap, shampoo and conditiiner was excellent. The room decor and lighting were contemporary. The prices of ala carta and buffet meals was far below imagination. The spread of breakfast and main meals was elaborate. I got far more value for money without loosing out on the services with an eternal smile from the staff I connected with. While every one of them was very polite and always smiled, I remember names of a few of them - Ravi, Ms. Iqra, Vijay, Babloo, Kanahiya, Pavan, Ramesh and Anurag. The ones whose names I have not been able to remember were also very good. I did not meet the chefs and the house cleaning staff but they made my stay very pleasant with excellent quality of food and well kept room.
The heating of the room, hot water was just perfect. I got better service than many 5 star hotels I have stayed in the past. I guess the selection and training of staff is far more important than the star category of the hotel. When in Lucknow, I will surely stay here only if they are not full. Well done Hotel Ginger, Lucknow. Keep doing the right things with a lovely smile.
